First strike, haste
[i]Raijinto[/i] – Whenever Ryoma, Supreme Samurai attacks, put a +1/+1 counter onto him and up to one other target creature that is attacking the same player.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Ryoma attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Ryoma and that creature gain trample until end of turn.
